charges.charge_disposition: Ct. 1, one mo. imprisonment; ct. 2 one mo concurrent; 3 yrs supervised release each ct. concurrent; $100.00 special assessment; Amendment: 1 month imprisonment, ct. 2 one month concurrent-Dft to serve the period of active incarceration in the Mecklenburg County Jail at the McLeod Center with work release as directed by the USPO; Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 yrs each count concurrent; $100.00 special assessment (1)

Ct. 1, one mo. imprisonment; ct. 2 one mo concurrent; 3 yrs supervised release each ct. concurrent; $100.00 special assessment; Amendment: 1 month imprisonment, ct. 2 one month concurrent-Dft to serve the period of active incarceration in the Mecklenburg County Jail at the McLeod Center with work release as directed by the USPO; Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 yrs each count concurrent; $100.00 special assessment (2)
